channel.title: TheGame NEW317-RelaunchedUPDATEDwebclientfullscreenEventsthisweek|best317prolly!
channel.description:
Just re-launched V2 of my server this week!
EVENT STILL HAVE TO COME!
Events will be hold when 10\20\30 online!
PLAY HERE Webclient
http://webclient.servegame.com/
http://thegame123.servegame.com/ Forums
free items on login if u say u come from moparscape server status page ^_^
- if u have a mac or something just add me on skype thocookiedo
and il send u my jar
Looking for professional video maker. will pay $ or Donator rank ingame
the server will hold events!
Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qvqTSR54d4w
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_tp8T-hWn0Y http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ho0jS4lzTmE
New features alot of em ;
Theiving > I upgraded the lv 95 stall now sells for 330k Fishing > Raw Sharks Price increased > Sell to shop Crafting > All amulets repriced increased > Sell to shop Mining/Smithhing > Mine Rune Ore > Smith Rune bar > Sell to shop Hunter > Impling jars > Ninja/Dragon imps 200/400k > sell to shop Woodcutting/Fletching > Cut Magic Log > Fletch Magic longbow 430k > Sell to shop Magic tree also gives bird nest THAT WILL DROP ON FLOOR
You have to pick it up and then click on it, you will receive a Crystal Key Crystal key; You could use it on the chest @ home and get random items OR you could sell it in the General Store for 15mill.
Almost all bosses working (including nex) Customized ::yell so new people can't yell untill I make them trusted member. You can unlock trusted member rank by signing up to the forums ^_^ & Introduce yourself.
Added ::dice for Donators so you wont have to buy dicebag.
THE WEBCLIENT NOW AUTO-DOWNLOADS Cache
Switching is now 100% ! Fixed dung/construct exp Added beginner rank All skills work! Epic ways of making money! Custom eco! Many more come check us out!
